meanings.definition: A person of low intelligence or mental capacity.
meanings.sent1: The idiot struggled to understand simple math problems.
meanings.sent2: Don't be an idiot and touch the hot stove.
meanings.sent3: The idiot tried to eat soup with a fork.
meanings.sent4: His decision to jump off the roof was truly idiotic.
meanings.sent5: She felt like an idiot after forgetting her own name.

meanings.sent1: The village idiot always made everyone laugh with his antics.
meanings.sent2: Don't act like an idiot and drive recklessly.
meanings.sent3: The idiot thought he could fly by flapping his arms.
meanings.sent4: Her choice to wear sandals in the snow was pure idiocy.
meanings.sent5: He was known as the class idiot for his constant pranks.
